name: NSPrinter
desc: An object that describes a printer’s capabilities.

items.name: init?(name: String)
items.desc: Creates and returns a printer object initialized with the specified printer name.

items.name: init?(type: NSPrinter.TypeName)
items.desc: Creates and returns a printer object initialized to the first available printer with the specified make and model information.

items.name: class var printerNames: [String]
items.desc: Returns the names of all available printers.

items.name: class var printerTypes: [NSPrinter.TypeName]
items.desc: Returns descriptions of the makes and models of all available printers.

items.name: struct NSPrinter.TypeName
items.desc: The type you use to describe a printer’s make and model.

items.name: var type: NSPrinter.TypeName
items.desc: A description of the printer’s make and model.

items.name: func pageSize(forPaper: NSPrinter.PaperName) -> NSSize
items.desc: Returns the size of the page for the specified paper type.

items.name: struct NSPrinter.PaperName
items.desc: The type you use to specify the name of a type of paper.

items.name: var languageLevel: Int
items.desc: The PostScript language level recognized by the printer.

items.name: var deviceDescription: [NSDeviceDescriptionKey : Any]
items.desc: A dictionary of keys and values that describe the device.

items.name: enum NSPrinter.TableStatus
items.desc: Constants that describe the state of a printer information table stored by a printer object.
